title: Designing Personalized Language Education Strategies Based on Learning Analytics

context.additional_context: A program emphasizing real-life language application skills, as learners have limited proficiency with digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more individual language learning weaknesses by analyzing language learning data.
Learners can establish personalized learning plans based on analysis results and revise them three or more times.
Learners can maintain a weekly learning goal achievement rate of 80% or higher using real-time feedback tools.
Educators can develop two or more class-specific teaching methodologies by interpreting learner data patterns.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
